document.full_text: an anti-tank missile fired from gaza hit an israeli school bus on thursday, wounding two people, and israeli forces retaliated by shelling the territory, killing a 50-year-old man, palestinian medics said.
document.title: two injured by gaza mortar; israel hits back
lines_and_colors: an anti-tank missile fired from gaza hit an israeli school bus on thursday, wounding two people, and israeli forces retaliated by shelling the territory, killing a 50-year-old man, palestinian medics said.
